- Improved face tracking
- Fixed a bug where green lines are appeared in videos recorded by users.
- Fixed a bug where the app can’t be controlled when returning from the background.
- Fixed a bug where the app crashes when users change videos that have different resolutions during recording.
- It is now possible to show search tags in other languages.
